title: Toxic Player told me to kill myself.
body:
This player was being extremely toxic. He stimulated an extremely negative behaviour that could result in a real person's death. This is in direct violation of the summoner's code and as far as I know comments of these nature are treated extremely seriously by Riot. The screenshot has been attached in the link provided.

PS. The game was remade.

replies.body: Did you report them in the post-game lobby? That would be the most effective way to deal with this

> [{quoted}](name=Glow,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=1qAvFAp1,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-22T22:47:59.026+0000)
>
> Did you report them in the post-game lobby? That would be the most effective way to deal with this

This.
Even reporting them won't get them permanently banned, it's Oceania so it is based on number of reports. I didn't even get a notification saying this player has been banned.

I fully agree, I know of quite a few people that suffer from depression, and while trying to have fun in a game, if these kinds of thing were said to them it could have really bad consequences. I see a lot of angry people typing "kill yourself" or "go get cancer and die" these kinds of quotes shouldn't be tolerated.

Riot should put in a censorship system.

What it should do is flag people who say certain phrases, etc.

> [{quoted}](name=xDarkRavenx,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=1qAvFAp1,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-08-23T12:22:59.068+0000)
>
> Riot should put in a censorship system.
> 
> What it should do is flag people who say certain phrases, etc.

There is already a system in place to detect players being toxic, and valid player reports help to shape this system and improve it.

Im not saying you shouldnt report old mate for telling you to kill yourself, but you shouldnt let their words get to you.
